content:
Craft an item of type: clock
inventory=[{"type": "golden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "redstone_lamp", "quantity": 34, "index": 12}, {"type": "cyan_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 33, "index": 19}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "peony", "quantity": 20, "index": 23}, {"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 14, "index": 34}, {"type": "stonecutter", "quantity": 14, "index": 41}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 12, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a clock, I first need to craft a gold_ingot. To do so, I will first place the gold_block from slot 22 into slot 1 of the crafting table.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: clock
inventory=[{"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "golden_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "redstone_lamp", "quantity": 34, "index": 12}, {"type": "cyan_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "turtle_spawn_egg", "quantity": 33, "index": 19}, {"type": "peony", "quantity": 20, "index": 23}, {"type": "cooked_salmon", "quantity": 14, "index": 34}, {"type": "stonecutter", "quantity": 14, "index": 41}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "purple_wool", "quantity": 12, "index": 45}]
thought: The gold_block has been placed in the crafting table, and now I can move the resulting gold_ingots from the output slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

Ok
